answers.answer: The joys of early pregnancy, this will fade in a few weeks and you'll get some energy back. I was like that with my pregnancies, now in 2nd trimester and feeling way better. Also you might need to have your iron levels checked this really makes your tiredness worse. My first child I was great, the next 2 were/is a drain!!iron tablets defo work for me though
No joke, I napped throughout my entire first trimester. Wish I could help, good luck.
Haha yup my second pregnancy i swear i slept for 2 weeks straight i had to have my dad and husband take my eldest to school because i couldnt wake up.
I've been whole pregnancy, turns out i had gestational diabetes; fatigue is one of the symptoms

question: I am 12 weeks and no matter what I eat and how much vitamins I consume I can't seem to get any energy. Even worse is when I do stuff like house work or go for a walk I am bed ridden the next day. This isn't my first pregnancy either but this one is literally kicking my ***
title: 12 weeks and soooo tired
